meanings.sent1: She chlorinates the pool water to keep it clean.
meanings.sent2: The water treatment plant chlorinates the drinking water to make it safe.
meanings.sent3: The chef chlorinates the vegetables before cooking them to ensure they are germ-free.
meanings.sent4: The sun's rays chlorinate the water in the pool, giving it a natural sparkle.
meanings.sent5: Remember to chlorinate the swimming pool regularly to prevent algae growth.

meanings.definition: To disinfect or purify with chlorine.
meanings.sent1: He chlorinates the countertops to kill any harmful bacteria.
meanings.sent2: The janitor chlorinates the floors to maintain a hygienic environment.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally knocked over the bottle of chlorine, chlorinating the entire room.
meanings.sent4: The strong smell of chlorine filled the air as she chlorinated the water in the bucket.
meanings.sent5: Chlorinate the water in the fish tank regularly to keep your aquatic pets healthy.
